description: The next boot up the little shredding ladder. These ski boots have a snug fit that's also comfortable thanks to Supercomfort JR liners. Like an adult boot, 4 buckles keep a sturdy footing, while flexible construction has just enough forgiveness to help developing skiers learn the ropes.Ratchet buckle at the cuff closes and tightens the boot.Lower buckles tighten the lower shell like adult boots.Supercomfort JR liners provide warmth and comfort.Forgiving flex provide just enough support to help with the learning process.Grip-Walk soles makes walking in boots easier.
name: Dalbello CX 4.0 GW Jr. Ski Boots - Youths
